steps.expected: Results filter in real-time as user types (with 500ms debounce per code)

issues: Real-time search triggers server error. The keyup/keydown handlers work but the API call fails.

observations: Code review shows search is implemented correctly: case-insensitive using StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase, searches TabName and LocalizedTabName, uses partial matching with IndexOf().
Real-time search is implemented with 500ms delay (delayTime: 500 in templatesHierarchy.js).
The GetPageTemplates API endpoint (TemplatesController.cs:216) is returning 500 Internal Server Error.
No page templates exist in the system. The template list shows 'You must save an existing page as a template prior to create a new template.'
Attempting to save a page as template via Content > Pages > Save Page Template also returns 500 error.
The consistent 500 errors suggest a backend configuration issue or database connectivity problem, not a code defect in the search feature itself.
The search UI components (textbox, real-time handlers) are correctly implemented and functional - the failure is at the API/server level.
